title.data: Our History - with a lot of random filler text in the title

description.data:
We are Appitized, the funeral industry specialists in mobile technology who offer unparalleled mobile solutions to funeral professionals both in the UK and overseas. We are the world leaders in the creation of funeral apps, and take great pride in growing our professional portfolio of work. As the official app partners of the NAFD, we have been trusted to create numerous mobile applications which reflect the needs of each individual funeral home.

Our wealth of knowledge and experience in creating funeral applications means that we can now offer our clients a range of options to suit businesses of all sizes. Not only do we craft bespoke applications to fit individual specifications, but we also offer packages to cover entry, mid and top level budgets. Our packages include features such as to-do lists, advice pages, obituary lists and more.
